name: inclusively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that tries to include different types or groups of people and treat them fairly and equally: At every step in the process, I was treated wonderfully, inclusively, by everyone involved with this film. The club was mixed and inclusively friendly.
in a way that includes the first and last date or number stated: Years of publication range from 1975 to 2003 inclusively. The box contains every digit from 1 to 9 inclusively.
More examplesFewer examplesWe are working closely with media to ensure that the stories are told fairly, accurately, and inclusively. The peace process will only succeed if it is driven by the political parties and groups themselves, by consensus, and inclusively.
